root: ^Black and purple tapestries hang from tall, stone pillars surrounding a crystalline throne at the center of the grandiose room.

priest: ^At the center of the room, a familiar black smoke coalesces once more and the demoness steps forth from the murky darkness. The succubus grins and clasps her hands together joyfully. "You finally made it! And you brought my puppet back to me!"
ire: ^Viola closes her eyes, lifting a single hand as the tips of her fingers start to glow. "Lady of Mercy - show kindness to those deserving of your love, and reveal your thorns to those beyond your mercy!"
^A smirk crosses the succubus’s lips as she steps forward. Then, all of a sudden, chains of blinding light lash out at her hooves and hands, pulling her back into a swelling gateway of pure light.
^"What! No- no, puppet! I-" the scream echoes painfully off the stone walls until it fades completely, leaving only the occasional rustle of small dust and debris sliding down the cavern interior.
^Viola watches the demon vanish, only averting her eyes once it has truly vanished. "Thank you for this opportunity, [[class]]. Not all are worthy of the lady's mercy. She will trouble us no longer."
questions: ^In a small alcove above the room, a familiar black smoke coalesces once more until the demon steps forth from the murky mass of darkness. "You finally made it! Now the real fun can begin!"
^A rusty gate suddenly closes behind you, trapping you inside the room! Before you can react, the succubus claps her hands excitedly. "Now I get to see my puppets fight, fight, FIGHT!
^The priest nods and absentmindedly strides toward you.
^questflag:ambercrystal;Reach for the crystal in your pocket
fightpriestess: ^You touch the crystal, the strange whispers flooding your mind once more. The overtone of thoughts is those of bloodlust and gleeful pride, echoing the emotions of the succubus above.
^Put the crystal down and prepare to fight
givein: ^You feel the desire for blood and violence rise inside you, soon drowning out every other thought until it takes over and sends you into a reckless fury!
down: ^Unsure of the crystal's influence, you put it back down and focus on the fight at hand.
bloodlust: ^You find the seed of demonic anger that fuels the bloodlust within the symphony of emotions resonating through the crystal. It feels almost tangible, malleable to the point where you can drown all other emotions out.

c-15: ^As you start to suppress all other emotions, you notice the demoness getting visibly more upset, finally leaping forward off the small balcony and into the arena.

pride: ^You find the seed of demonic pride amongst the symphony of emotions resonating through the crystal. It feels almost tangible, malleable to the point where you can drown all other emotions out.

c-16: ^As you start to suppress all other emotions, the demoness begins to stand taller, puffing her chest out until she suddenly leaps off the balcony and into the arena in one fluent motion.
^"Why would I waste my time watching puppets fight, I'll just slay you myself!"

fightsuc: ^The priest stands dazed for a moment as the demons influence visibly subsides.
^"Thank you for breaking me free, [[class]]. I am sure you have a lot of questions."
^From high above, a slow clapping bounces off the stone walls. "Very good! Very good! Again, go again!" the succubus' eyes begin to glow, and your vision starts to blur...
defeatsuccubus: ^Scowling, the demoness slinks back against one of the stone walls. Then her expression changes, the anger melting away like snow before the sun, replaced by a sultry glare.

^"So strong. So powerful." she gasps, slowly rising to her hooves. "Maybe I've misjudged you, not-a-puppet." she adds, steadying herself. "But you wouldn't hold that against me, would  you, champion? I can be oh-so-useful once you get to know me..."
^Recruit: We just got off on the wrong hoof
banish: ^"What! No- no, puppet! I-" screeching, the howls as you strike the final blow, banishing the demoness to the abyss.
^The priest blinks absentmindedly a moment before the banished demons influence visibly subsides.
^"Thank you for my freedom, [[class]], I have a great debt to repay. Not just to you, but to the order of the White Rose as well, as I could not bestow the Lady's mercy on this... creature."
takesuccubus: ^The demon perks up. "Not just strong, but wise as well! You won't regret this champion! As a token of good faith, you can have my puppet!"
^The priest blinks absentmindedly a moment before the demons influence visibly subsides.

^"I thank you for my freedom, but I can not condone your... company. I will head back to Brightcandle and report on the situation. Do be careful." the priestess adds with a glare in the direction of the succubus.

c-27: ^"I am Viola Skysword, high priestess of the Order of the White Rose. I was summoned to guide the Dawnbringer in spiritual matters, as the prophecy foretold."

c-0: ^"The Dawnbringer is our champion of the light. The one who will free the Shattered Realms from darkness. Every few hundred years Rae sends us one of her children to aid our battle against the ever-encroaching darkness and push the demons back."

c-28: ^"We... I mean, I was part of the Dawnbringer's entourage. We were searching for a way into the Black Citadel when a demon and her minions attacked us."
^"And then the Dawnbringer just... left us! I couldn't believe my eyes as he walked away from the battle and disappeared into one of the tunnels."
c-29: ^"I don't know- after he left us he went into one of these tunnels. there must be something down there he needed very much. There was something in his eyes that... frightened me."

findhim: ^The priest nods and removes the Sun-shaped amulet before handing it to you.
^"Then the White Rose will aid you, hero. Use this amulet should you need aid in the journey ahead. I'll pray for you and see to it Rae looks kindly upon your quest."
leave: ^"Then may the White Rose watch over you, [[class]]. I am not sure if your mercy for this creature is misplaced, or you are further along the path than I am."
